Name: Reverse Vesper Martini
Ingredients: 30 ml Blanc quinquina/kina (e.g. Mattei Cap Corse, Bonal or Kina L'Aér
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: More a subtly fortified wine than a true "three and under the guest" Martini, but delightfully so with sherry-like wine notes and faint botanical influences. Some will say this should be stirred despite the 'Vesper' name. Shake boldly on, but with good ice.
History: A riff on James Bond's preferred Vesper Martini by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Reverse Vesper Martini contains 156 calories
